DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety plasma concentration change quetiapine multiple oral administration FK949E ( extended-release formulation quetiapine ) elderly patient major depressive disorder ( MDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Tolerability FK949E Elderly Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
